Text:
Hi NDP, I appreciate your timely uploads of Chelsea Lately. A new show, "After Lately" has just started on E. See
http://www.eonline.com/on/shows/after_lately/index.html

Apparently there is a new show every Sunday at 11pm EST.

If it's not too much trouble, could you upload a few episodes? Thanks in advance.
Some confusion, TV.COM says "After Lately" is on weekdays at 11pm. They probably mean M-Th for new episodes. Who knows?
Correction? According to TV.COM, After Lately is on weeknights at 11pm.

Thanks for the early upload. Your very were much appreciated, by chelsea lately fans.

Thanks
Hey EdgarS789 It was uploaded by NDP here is the link http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6225310/After.Lately.S01E01.The.List.HDTV.XviD-NdP
